advancements.cataclysm_ut.kill_amethyst_: You can also eat this crab!
advancements.cataclysm_ut.kill_aptrgangr: Somehow, it didn't kill me instantly
advancements.cataclysm_ut.kill_ender_gua: §lThe golem was designed to kill dragons, but its creators overestimated the dragons and made it too strong.
advancements.cataclysm_ut.kill_harbinger: §lA near-future mecha that overcomes battery dead by using Nether Star as a battery. There is no limit to its power.
advancements.cataclysm_ut.kill_ignis.des: §lVictory over Ignis, the god who rules over all life.
advancements.cataclysm_ut.kill_leviathan: §lDefeat Leviathan, the mighty whale that swallowed Terminus.
advancements.cataclysm_ut.kill_maledictu: §lDefeat Maledictus, a warrior undetected by §kApollyon§r§l§5, who lurks in the Nether.
advancements.cataclysm_ut.kill_monstrosi: §lA huge golem built with higher quality Netherite. The biggest drawback is that the attack power is too high to be useful.
§lLow quality duplicate much like Netherite Monstrosity.
advancements.cataclysm_ut.kill_remnant.d: §lWhat appears to be two mighty bone dinosaurs, a slow but aggressive older brother and an aggressive younger brother, is actually just one dinosaur splitting into two.
advancements.cataclysm_ut.win_terminus.d: §lYou now stand at the brink of infinity. The power you have amassed is extraordinary.  You have absolute power. The world of Minecraft itself seems to kneel to you. There are few barriers before you.
item.cataclysm_ut.bottomlesslavabucket.d: Contains an endless amount of lava, Installation method differs from that of a regular bucket
item.cataclysm_ut.bottomlesssandbucket.d: Contains an endless amount of sand(You can get an infinite amount of sand instead of installing it)
item.cataclysm_ut.crabbait.description_0: Summons amethyst crabs. Does not consume. (Players cannot eat!)
item.cataclysm_ut.desertmedallion.descri: §lFrom another world, a medallion. Summon Desert Guardian
Capable of soaking up an endless amount of lava
item.cataclysm_ut.lifefire.description_0: Restores 5 percent of the player's health.
item.cataclysm_ut.mechdrill.description_: It can destroy most blocks in an instant, but often doesn't drop
item.cataclysm_ut.netheritesummon.descri: Summons a giant Netherite golem. (be consumed)
item.cataclysm_ut.superfishingrod.descri: Fishing rod with magic granted, left click can attract fish around it
item.cataclysm_ut.terminus.description_0: An artifact with unlimited power. If you want to use it, you need to be prepared for it.
item.cataclysm_ut.the_terminus.descripti: In addition to the arrow, it fires 5 ★, This ★ deals damage that ignores invincibility.
